body_html:
@suhang1994 You can install your own version of MKL and configure TensorFlow to use it. Please note, however, that the blog post that you refer to shows MKL with TBB outperforming MKL with OpenMP when executing ten simultaneous calls to LU factorization. This is quite unlikely situation for typical machine learning models.

Adding @agramesh1 for any additional thoughts.

This is quite unlikely situation for typical machine learning models.

body:
@suhang1994  You can install your own version of MKL and configure TensorFlow to use it.  Please note, however, that the blog post that you refer to shows MKL with TBB outperforming MKL with OpenMP when executing ten simultaneous calls to LU factorization. This is quite unlikely situation for typical machine learning models. 

Adding @agramesh1 for any additional thoughts.
